source.title: QA Skills Blueprint for Claude Code CLI

claim: Claude Code becomes genuinely useful for QA only when given a small set of deterministic local skills that speak the cert/trace language

concepts.society_of_minds: multi-agent reachability machine with QA constitution

role_decomposition.planner: Converts intent to contract (inputs, outputs, invariants)
role_decomposition.verifier: Runs schema validation, hash checks, sweep

invariants: Golden fixtures required for new cert types
Repo sweep must pass after any change
Every trace move logged as {move, fail_type, invariant_diff}

failure_modes.description: Skill produces different output for same input
New cert type without golden test vectors
